org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core

Class DeviceInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bytedeco.javacpp.Pointer
      • org.bytedeco.opencv.opencv_core.DeviceInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    @Namespace(value="cv::cuda")
 @NoOffset
 @Properties(inherit=opencv_core.class)
public class DeviceInfo
extends Pointer
    \brief Class providing functionality for querying the specified GPU properties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DeviceInfo

        public DeviceInfo(Pointer p)
        Pointer cast constructor. Invokes Pointer(Pointer).

      • DeviceInfo

        public DeviceInfo()
        creates DeviceInfo object for the current GPU

      • DeviceInfo

        public DeviceInfo(int device_id)
        \brief The constructors.

        Parameters:
        device_id - System index of the CUDA device starting with 0.

        Constructs the DeviceInfo object for the specified device. If device_id parameter is missed, it constructs an object for the current device.

      • supports

        @Cast(value="bool")
public boolean supports(@Cast(value="cv::cuda::FeatureSet")
                                             int feature_set)
        \brief Provides information on CUDA feature support.

        Parameters:
        feature_set - Features to be checked. See cuda::FeatureSet.

        This function returns true if the device has the specified CUDA feature. Otherwise, it returns false

      • isCompatible

        @Cast(value="bool")
public boolean isCompatible()
        \brief Checks the CUDA module and device compatibility.

        This function returns true if the CUDA module can be run on the specified device. Otherwise, it returns false .
